entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 7:49 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
